short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pull request management for OpenText Octane developers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension assists OpenText Octane developers in managing their pull requests. It establishes a connection to a dedicated server to fetch information about pull requests and builds from Octaneâ€™s GitHub and Jenkins.
